item.title: 北约上将称投票后美国不可能停止支持乌克兰
item.description: 北约高级军官说，无论总统选举结果如何，美国都不可能停止支持乌克兰对抗俄罗斯，因为前总统唐纳德-特朗普在与副总统卡马拉-哈里斯的首场辩论中表示，他希望战争结束。【原文：The US is unlikely to stop supporting Ukraine against Russia irrespective of the outcome of the presidential election, NATO’s senior military officer said, as former President Donald Trump told the first debate with Vice President Kamala Harris that he wants the war to be over.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市将因 GDP 数据而下挫
乌克兰希望印度在结束俄罗斯战争中发挥更积极的作用
item.description: 乌克兰驻新德里大使说，如果印度想赢得联合国安理会常任理事国席位，就应在结束俄罗斯在乌克兰的战争中发挥更积极的作用。【原文：India should play a more active role in ending Russia’s war in Ukraine if it wants to win a permanent seat on the United Nations Security Council, Ukraine’s ambassador in New Delhi said.】

item.title: 降息不会迅速缓解消费者压力
item.description:
消费者在走，美国经济也在走，压力显而易见。另外：预测市场认为哈里斯在辩论中获胜。【原文：

As consumers go, so goes the US economy — and the pressure is evident. Plus: Prediction markets give the debate win to Harris.

】

item.title: 石油交易商蒙特福特从竞争对手 BGN 聘请 Yannick Luce 担任首席财务官
item.description: 石油贸易商蒙特福特集团（Montfort Group）聘请亚尼克-卢斯（Yannick Luce）担任首席财务官，该公司正寻求整合其在非洲和中东的仓储和炼油资产等业务。【原文：Oil trader Montfort Group has hired Yannick Luce as chief financial officer, just as the firm seeks to consolidate operations that include storage and refinery assets in Africa and the Middle East.】

item.title: 肯尼亚航空工人就拟议的阿达尼交易开始罢工
item.description: 肯尼亚航空业工人开始罢工，抗议阿达尼机场控股有限公司接管肯尼亚最大机场的运营计划，该计划将持续 30 年。【原文：Kenyan aviation workers began a strike to protest plans for Adani Airport Holdings Ltd. to take over operations of the nation’s biggest airport for 30 years.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事欧洲
item.description:
及时了解市场监测情况

 

Get up to speed with what the markets are monitoring

 

】

item.title: SBF 前女友埃里森要求免于因 FTX 入狱
item.description: 山姆-班克曼-弗里德的前女友要求不因参与 FTX 倒闭而被送进监狱。【原文：Sam Bankman-Fried’s former girlfriend is asking to not be sent to prison for her involvement in the collapse of FTX.】

item.title: 铁矿石跌至每吨 90 美元使矿山面临风险，铁矿石测试下限
item.description: 随着高成本矿山被挤出市场，铁矿石价格将在每吨 90 美元或更高的价位找到坚实的支撑。【原文：Iron ore’s plunge is about to test the view that the steelmaking material can find solid price support at $90 a ton or more as high-cost mines are nudged out of the market.】

item.title: 印尼 GoJek 试行普拉博沃免费午餐计划
item.description: GoTo 集团正在为学童分发免费午餐进行试运行，这是印尼当选总统普拉博沃-苏比安托（Prabowo Subianto）的一项基石计划，将于明年推出。【原文：GoTo Group is conducting trial runs for the distribution of free lunches to school children, a cornerstone program of Indonesian President-elect Prabowo Subianto that’s set to be rolled out next year.】

item.title: 本田在华裁员，三家工厂停产
item.description: 本田汽车公司（Honda Motor Co., Ltd.）正在裁员，并暂停其在中国三家工厂的生产，因为该公司正努力减少库存，并致力于在全球最大的汽车市场上进行更广泛的战略转型。【原文：Honda Motor Co. is slashing jobs and has paused production at three of its plants in China, as it seeks to trim inventories and work on a broader shift in strategy in the world’s largest car market.】

item.title: 中国的债券干预措施降低了短端利率，促进了交易
item.description: 从非基准 "特殊 "证券交易激增到短期债券收益率下滑，中国对本国政府债券市场的干预正在导致整个曲线出现异常。【原文：China’s intervention in the nation’s government bond market is leading to abnormalities across the curve, from a surge in trading of non-benchmark “special” securities to a slump in yields on short-maturity debt.】

item.title: 石油跌入 60 美元为全球经济软着陆拓宽了跑道
item.description: 如果对石油的一些最悲观的预测属实，那么世界发达经济体就有了一个新的理由，希望在明年获得更稳固的增长。【原文：The world’s advanced economies might just have a new reason to hope for a firmer growth footing in the next year, if some of the most bearish forecasts for oil hit the mark.】

item.title: 联合信贷银行从德国政府手中购得德国商业银行 4.5% 的股份
item.description: 意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）收购了德国政府出售的德国商业银行股份公司（Commerzbank AG）4.49% 的股份，使这家意大利贷款机构成为主要投资者。【原文：UniCredit SpA has bought the 4.49% stake that the German government has sold in Commerzbank AG, making the Italian lender a major investor.】

item.title: 中国商迈将目光投向新加坡和香港设立海外办事处
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，中国商用飞机制造商中国商飞正在考虑在中国大陆以外的亚洲地区开设首家办事处，以帮助其C919单通道喷气式飞机在海外获得吸引力，并更好地与空中客车公司（Airbus SE）和波音公司（Boeing Co.【原文：Chinese planemaker Comac is considering opening its first offices in Asia outside of mainland China, people familiar with the matter said, as part of a push to help its C919 single-aisle jet gain traction overseas and better compete against aircraft from Airbus SE and Boeing Co.】

item.title: 对冲印度银行股波动突然变得便宜了
item.description: 在连续数月表现不佳后，期权交易商对印度银行的疑虑逐渐减少。【原文：Options traders are getting less skeptical about Indian banks after months of underperformance.】

item.title: 中国房地产下滑导致垃圾债券创年内最长跌势
item.description: 中国的垃圾美元债券连续七天下跌，创下自 2023 年 8 月以来的最长跌势，此前疲软的房屋销售数据凸显了中国日益加深的房地产低迷。【原文：China’s junk dollar bonds suffered seven straight days of declines, the longest such stretch since August 2023, after weak home sales data underscored the country’s deepening real estate slump.】

item.title: 印度医药股或将从美国法案中获得新的推动力
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 随着 L&T 公司加入芯片制造行列，印度半导体雄心日渐膨胀
item.description: 拉森-托布鲁克有限公司（Larsen & Toubro Ltd.）计划投资 3 亿多美元创建一家芯片公司，与其他印度企业集团一起推动在世界人口最多的国家建立半导体产业。【原文：Larsen & Toubro Ltd. plans to invest more than $300 million to create a chip company, joining other Indian conglomerates in a push to build out a semiconductor industry in the world’s most populous country.】

item.title: 印度尼西亚将成立核电计划实施委员会
item.description: 据当地媒体援引印尼能源和矿产资源部的消息报道，印尼计划成立一个政府委员会，负责制定战略，首次全面建设核电站。【原文：Indonesia plans to establish a government committee that will create a strategy to build full-scale nuclear power stations for the first time, local media reported, citing the Energy and Mineral Resources Ministry.】

item.title: 经济放缓担忧加剧，全球债券收益率降至两年低点
item.description: 由于对主要经济体增长放缓的担忧以及对降息预期的增加，本周全球债券收益率下滑至两年来的最低点。【原文：Global bond yields slid to a two-year low this week due to concern over slowing growth in major economies and increasing expectations for interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 交易链接启动，中国交易员涌入阿里巴巴股票市场
item.description: 随着阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司在香港上市的股票首次直接向中国内地投资者开放，中国内地投资者蜂拥而至。【原文：Mainland Chinese investors flocked to Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. as its Hong Kong-listed stock was made directly available to them for the first time.】

item.title: 德意志银行的霍尔茨詹称美国重新定价将加剧波动性
item.description: 最近几天，降息押注刺激了国债市场，但德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）的私人银行部门警告说，由于美国政策制定者的宽松程度可能低于交易商的预期，国债市场的波动性即将上升。【原文：Interest-rate-cut bets have galvanized Treasuries in recent days but Deutsche Bank AG’s private banking arm warns that volatility is about to rise as US policymakers may ease less than traders expect.】

item.title: 日本央行官员发表讲话后，日元升至 1 月 2 日以来最强
item.description: 在日本央行的一位董事就货币政策发表评论后，日元兑美元升至年初以来的最强水平。【原文：The yen advanced to its strongest level against the dollar since the start of the year after a Bank of Japan board member commented on monetary policy.】

item.title: 日本央行董事会成员发出仍有可能加息的信号，提振日元走势
item.description: 日本央行董事会成员中川顺子（Junko Nakagawa）表示，只要经济表现符合预期，日本央行将继续调整未来政策。【原文：The Bank of Japan will continue to adjust policy going forward provided the economy performs in line with its projections, BOJ Board Member Junko Nakagawa said, in comments that bumped the yen to its highest level against the dollar since January.】

item.title: 哈里斯与支持加密货币的特朗普在辩论中发生冲突，比特币下跌
item.description: 由于交易商对民主党提名人卡马拉-哈里斯和共和党竞争对手唐纳德-特朗普之间的美国总统辩论做出了反应，比特币下滑。【原文：Bitcoin slipped as traders reacted to the US presidential debate between Democratic nominee Kamala Harris and Republican rival Donald Trump, who has embraced the crypto sector.】

item.title: 在线经纪商正在从更大的竞争对手手中抢夺日本市场份额
item.description: 日本顶级在线证券公司正在增加其在投资信托市场的份额，而银行和传统经纪商几十年来一直专注于面对面销售。【原文：Japan’s top online securities firms are increasing their share of the investment trust market at the expense of banks and traditional brokerages that focused for decades on face-to-face sales.】

item.title: 日本三井物产将把股票回购计划增加一倍
item.description: 日本贸易公司三井物产株式会社（Mitsui & Co.【原文：Japanese trading firm Mitsui & Co. said it will double its share buyback plan to boost shareholder returns and improve capital efficiency.】

item.title: 亨特称澳大利亚央行对就业指标的有限宽松感到 "意外
item.description: 澳大利亚央行行长助理萨拉-亨特（Sarah Hunter）表示，澳大利亚央行对今年一些关键就业指标的 "有限 "宽松感到惊讶，这进一步强化了央行的观点，即劳动力市场仍在满负荷以上运行。【原文：Australia’s central bank has been surprised by the “limited” easing this year in some key employment indicators, Assistant Governor Sarah Hunter said, reinforcing its view that the labor market is still operating above full capacity.】

item.title: 罗氏在技术升级困境中退休，澳大利亚证券交易所任命克拉克为主席
item.description: 大卫-克拉克（David Clarke）将出任澳大利亚证券交易所有限公司（ASX Ltd.）主席，该公司是澳大利亚主要股票和衍生品交易所的运营商，多年来一直致力于清算和结算技术系统的升级。【原文：David Clarke will become chair at ASX Ltd., the operator of Australia’s main equities and derivatives exchange that’s battled with a years-long upgrade of its clearing and settlement technology system.】
